snippet: Medeski Martin & Wood was the fulcrum of an evening of funk at the Undead Music Festival at the Brooklyn Masonic Armory.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews performance by jazz funk band Medeski Martin & Wood at the Brooklyn Masonic Armory, as part of the Undead Music Festival.
lead_paragraph: Medeski Martin & Wood was the fulcrum of an evening of funk at the Undead Music Festival at the Brooklyn Masonic Armory.

headline.seo: Medeski Martin & Wood at the Undead Music Festival
headline.main: A Trio and Its Many Talented Friends
headline.print_headline: A Trio and Its Many Talented Friends
